attributes.action: Scrap plans for a bin tax & concentrate on working with communities to recycle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposed bin tax is just another stealth tax to be paid by the long suffering public - the disadvantages will be more fly tipping & litter,health & safety problems,  pressure on low income households, & a costly bureaucracy to collect the charge.  Rubbish collection costs should come out of the council tax.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
